p:
SST, temperature and circulation data are involved in observational composite analysis. For upper-air atmospheric fields, we use the monthly mean European Center for Medium Range Weather Forecasting (ECMWF) reanalysis dataset (ERA-Interim)
59, 60 , which is extended from 1979 to near-real time, available at http://apps.ecmwf.int/datasets/. For SST, we use the monthly-mean product from the Hadley Centre Sea Ice and Sea Surface Temperature (HadISST) dataset
61 , available at http://www.metoffice.gov.uk/hadobs/hadisst/data/download.html.
